cause.description:
you might not know it but more than 100 animals over NA are being abused tested on harmed in general. these animals are dying and asking for your help- be genorous and save them!
1. animals have rights
2. animals feel pain like humans
cause.mission: raise as much money to save animals all over north america from abuse testing and fighting etc.
cause.name: Animal Abuse, fighting, abandoning and testing- STOP ALL OF IT NOW!
